General.Name: Suruga Bank Ltd
General.Description: Suruga Bank Ltd. provides various banking and financial products and services to individuals and companies in Japan. The company offers deposit products, such as time, funded term, foreign currency, non-interest-bearing, and other deposits, as well as current and general accounts; card, housing, second house/resort, startup, project assistance, and business up-date loans, as well as loans by purpose; credit and debit cards; and overdrafts and other financing products. It also provides investment trust, insurance, inheritance/trust, lottery ticket, foreign currency exchange, pay-easy, Web talk acceptance, safe deposit box, pension receipt, public bond, fund management, e-combination, payment, long-term care medical fee reimbursement factoring, mortgage, and Internet and telephone banking services. In addition, the company offers printing, temporary staffing, leasing, guarantee, management consulting, and accounts receivable collection services. It operates through a network of 133 branches in Japan. The company was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Numazu, Japan.
